original_title: Turma da Mônica - A estrelinha mágica e outras histórias
overview: Have you ever imagined a little star alone, abandoned, that by accident ended up falling to Earth? Monica and Cebolinha found her and together they live an exciting adventure. This and many more of 'Turma da Mônica' adventures and stories.
title: Turma da Mônica - A estrelinha mágica e outras histórias
